metadata.name: Potential Manage-bde.wsf Abuse To Proxy Execution
metadata.comment: Detects potential abuse of the "manage-bde.wsf" script as a LOLBIN to proxy execution

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wscript.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wscript.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('manage-bde.wsf')) OR (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\cscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\wscript.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('manage-bde.wsf')) AND NOT endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects potential abuse of the "manage-bde.wsf" script as a LOLBIN to proxy execution
